caption.center: WILLIAM E. GARDNER, Appellant/Cross-Appellee, v. THOMAS HOOVER,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Volusia County, J. David Walsh, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Thomas C. Smith of Hassell, Moorhead Carroll, Daytona Beach, for Appellant/Cross-Appellee.
Rick Kolodinsky, New Smyrna Beach, and Barbara Green of Barbara Green, P.A., Coral Gables, for Appellee/Cross-Appellant.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
GRIFFIN, SAWAYA and TORPY, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
